scripts.ncs:dev: npm run json2ts:qiita && npm run prisma:generate && npm run tsx:dev
scripts.ncs:qc: dotenvx run -f compose.qc.env -- docker compose -f compose.qc.yml up -d --pull always --force-recreate -V --wait && NCS_ENV=qc npm run prisma:migrate:deploy && npm run vitest
scripts.json2ts:qiita: mkdir -p type/qiita && wget -O - https://qiita.com/api/v2/schema | json2ts > type/qiita/api.ts
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy: dotenvx run -f prisma.${NCS_ENV}.env -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.tsx:dev: dotenvx run -f app.dev.env -f prisma.dev.env -- tsx watch app/main.ts
scripts.tsx:prod: dotenvx run -f app.prod.env -f prisma.prod.env -- tsx app/main.ts
